''Instructions:''
<$list filter='[[$:/state/Generic Search and Replace/Selected Action]!has[text]'> Select an action from the menu above to see instructions. <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/Generic Search and Replace/Selected Action' text='Add Tags'> This can be used to add a tag to multiple tiddlers at the same time. Enter the tag you wish to add in the `Tag to Add` text box and click one of the buttons. If you click `Add Tag to all Results` than the tag is added to every tiddler returned by the search. If you click on `Add Tag to Selected Tiddlers` the tag is added to all tiddlers that are selected from the search results. If you add a tag to a tiddler that already has that tag the tiddler is unaffected.

__Tag to add__:
<$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Add Tags' field='tag_to_add' placeholder='Tag to Add'/>
<$button> Add Tag to all Results <> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Add Tags' $field='tag_to_add' $value=''/> <$button> Add Tag to Selected Results <$vars ListStart="""<$list filter='[[$:/state/Generic Search and Replace/Selected Tiddlers]getindexprefix[true]]'>""" ListEnd=""""""> <> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Add Tags' $field='tag_to_add' $value=''/> <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/Generic Search and Replace/Selected Action' text='Remove Tags'> This can be used to remove a tag from multiple tiddlers at the same time. Enter the tag you wish to remove in the `Tag to Remove` text box and click one of the buttons. If you click `Remove Tag from all Results` than the tag is removed from every tiddler returned by the search. If you click on `Remove Tag from Selected Tiddlers` the tag is removed from all tiddlers that are selected from the search results. If you try to remove a tag from a tiddler that doesn't have the tag the tiddler is unaffected.

__Tag to remove__:
<$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Remove Tags' field='tag_to_remove' placeholder='Tag to Remove'/>
<$button> Remove Tag from all Results <> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Remove Tags' $field='tag_to_remove' $value=''/> <$button> Remove Tag from Selected Results <$vars ListStart="""<$list filter='[[$:/state/Generic Search and Replace/Selected Tiddlers]getindexprefix[true]]'>""" ListEnd=""""""> <> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Remove Tags' $field='tag_to_remove' $value=''/> <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/Generic Search and Replace/Selected Action' text='Replace Tags'> This can be used to replace one tag with another tag on multiple tiddlers at the same time. Enter the tag you wish to replace in the `Old Tag` text box and what you wish to replace it with in the `New Tag` text box then click one of the buttons. If you click `Replace Tag in all Results` than the tag is replaced on every tiddler returned by the search. If you click on `Replace Tag in Selected Tiddlers` the tag is replaced in all tiddlers that are selected from the search results. If you select a tiddler that doesn't have the original tag the new tag is still added to the tiddler.

__Old tag__:
<$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Replace Tags' field='tag_to_replace' placeholder='Tag to Replace'/>
__New tag__:
<$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Replace Tags' field='replacement_tag' placeholder='New Tag'/>
<$button> Replace Tag in all Results <> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Replace Tags' $field='tag_to_replace' $value=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Replace Tags' $field='replacement_tag' $value=''/> <$button> Replace Tag in Selected Results <$vars ListStart="""<$list filter='[[$:/state/Generic Search and Replace/Selected Tiddlers]getindexprefix[true]]'>""" ListEnd=""""""> <> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Replace Tags' $field='tag_to_replace' $value=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Replace Tags' $field='replacement_tag' $value=''/> <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/Generic Search and Replace/Selected Action' text='Add Fields'> This can be used to add a field to multiple tiddlers at the same time. Enter the field name in the `Field Name` text box and the field contents, if any, in the `Field Contents` text box then click one of the buttons. If you click on `Add Field to all Results` the field is added to every tiddler returned by the search. If you click on `Add Field to Selected Results` the field is added to all tiddlers that are selected from the search results. If you add a field to a tiddler that already has a field with that name than the old field is overwritten. (I will add an option to leave existing fields alone later)

__Field to Add__:
<$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Add Field' field='field_name' placeholder='Field to Add'/>
__Field contents__:
<$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Add Field' field='field_contents' placeholder='Field Contents'/>
<$button> Add Field to all Results <> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Add Field' $field='field_name' $value=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Add Field' $field='field_contents' $value=''/> <$button> Add Field to Selected Results <$vars ListStart="""<$list filter='[[$:/state/Generic Search and Replace/Selected Tiddlers]getindexprefix[true]]'>""" ListEnd=""""""> <> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Add Field' $field='field_name' $value=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Add Field' $field='field_contents' $value=''/> <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/Generic Search and Replace/Selected Action' text='Remove Fields'> This can be used to remove a field from multiple tiddlers at the same time. Enter the field name in the `Field Name` text box and click one of the buttons. If you click on `Remove Field from all Results` the field is removed from every tiddler returned by the search. If you click on `Remove Field from Selected Results` the field is removed from all tiddlers that are selected from the search results. If you remove a field from a tiddler that doesn't have a field with that name than the tiddler is unaffected.

__Field to Remove__:
<$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Remove Field' field='field_name' placeholder='Field to Remove'/>
<$button> Remove Field from all Results <> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Remove Field' $field='field_name' $value=''/> <$button> Remove Field from Selected Results <$vars ListStart="""<$list filter='[[$:/state/Generic Search and Replace/Selected Tiddlers]getindexprefix[true]]'>""" ListEnd=""""""> <> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Remove Field' $field='field_name' $value=''/> <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/Generic Search and Replace/Selected Action' text='Rename Fields'> This can be used to rename existing fields in multiple tiddlers at the same time. If you click on `Rename Field in all Results` the field is renamed in every tiddlers returned by the search. If you click `Rename Field in Selected Results` the field is renamed in the tiddlers selected from the search results.

__Old Field name__:
<$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Rename Field' field='old_field_name' placeholder='Field to Rename'/>
__New Field name__:
<$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Rename Field' field='new_field_name' placeholder='New Name'/>
<$button> Rename Field in all Results <> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Rename Field' $field='old_field_name' $value=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Rename Field' $field='new_field_name' $value=''/> <$button> Rename Field in Selected Results <$vars ListStart="""<$list filter='[[$:/state/Generic Search and Replace/Selected Tiddlers]getindexprefix[true]]'>""" ListEnd=""""""> <> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Rename Field' $field='old_field_name' $value=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Rename Field' $field='new_field_name' $value=''/> <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/Generic Search and Replace/Selected Action' text='Change Field Contents'>

$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.case_sensitive_help: If this is checked than the search is case sensitive.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.field_contents_column_help: This lists the contents of the fields returned by the search. Clicking on the field contents lets you edit it.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.field_name_column_help: This lists the field names returned by the search. Clicking on a field name lets you rename the field in that tiddler. Clicking on the plus icon lets you add a new field to the tiddler. Currently empty fields are not shown.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.fix_things_help: If no search results are showing up click this button to reset everything to default values. You may also have to click on this button in order to initialize everything the first time you import this tiddler.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.include_created_field_help: If this is checked than the created field is included in the list and search.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.include_modified_field_help: If this is checked than the modified field is included in the list and search.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.include_system_tiddlers_help: If this is checked than system tiddlers are included in the list.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.include_this_tiddler_help: Checking this includes the search tiddler in the search results. You probably want to uncheck this.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.include_type_field_help: If this is checked than the type field is included in the list and search.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.list_tags_as_a_field: If this is checked than the tags field is treated the same as other fields for searches and in the table. Be careful with this because if a tiddler doesn't have a tags field than it won't be displayed in the table. A tiddler with an empty tags field will be displayed.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.override_tiddler_limit_help: If this is checked than you can override the default 100 result limit. If it is checked than the number of tiddlers displayed is capped at 100. If you display a large number of tiddlers your wiki may respond very slowly.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.search_by_field_name_help: This searches tiddlers by field name. If a tiddler has a field that matches the search the tiddler is listed.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.search_by_name_help: This is used to search through tiddlers by name. Tiddlers with titles that match the search are listed.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.search_by_tag_help: This searches tiddlers by tag. If a tiddler has a tag that matches the search it is listed.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.show_all_or_matching_fields_help: If `All Fields` is selected than all fields of the displayed tiddlers are shown in the table. If `Only Matching Fields` is selected than only the fields that match the search in `Search by field name` are displayed.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.show_field_contents_help: If this is checked than a fields contents is displayed along with the field title in the results table.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.show_fields_column_help: If this is checked the fields column is visibe in the results table. Uncheck it to hide the column.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.show_tags_column_help: If this is checked the tags column is visible in the results table. Uncheck it to hide the colmun.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.tags_table_column_help: This lists the tags for each listed tiddler. It acts the same as the tag editing does when editing a tiddler normally.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.tiddler_table_column_help: This lists the names of the tiddlers that match your search. Clicking on the icon next to the name will let you edit the tiddler title.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Settings
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.caption: Settings
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Setting.text:
\define thisHelpButton(label) ^^(<$button popup="""$:/temp/popup/$(currentTiddler)$/$label$""" class='tc-btn-invisible'>?)<$reveal type='popup' state="""$:/temp/popup/$(currentTiddler)$/$label$""">
<$view field="""$label$""" mode=block/>
^^ \end Notes: *Renaming the tags field doesn't work and may never work. *Searching by field contents requires some updates to the list widget so it will have to come later Things to add: *Batch add field *Batch remove field *Batch add tag *Batch remove tag *Batch delete tiddler *Batch search and replace field name *Batch search and replace field contents (based on field name, doing this based on contents requires some edits to the list widget) *Batch search and replace tag <$checkbox tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Search' field=include_system_tiddlers checked="[all[]]" unchecked="[!is[system]]"> Include system tiddlers <>

<$checkbox tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Search' field=show_tags checked='' unchecked='+[limit[1]]'> Show tags column <>
<$checkbox tiddler='$:/temp/Generic Search and Replace/Search' field=show_fields checked='' unchecked='+[limit[1]]'> Show fields column <>

$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Tiddler.search_by_field_name_help: This searches tiddlers by field name. If a tiddler has a field that matches the search the tiddler is listed.
$:/plugins/inmysocks/TiddlerTool/Tiddler.search_by_name_help: This is used to search through tiddlers by name. Tiddlers with titles that match the search are listed.
